metadata.title: USN-5636-1 -- SoS vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that SoS incorrectly handled certain data. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5636-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  sosreport - 3.9.1-1ubuntu0.16.04.2+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
